languages.text: "Привести тебя сюда, к Алтарю Перемен, и не задавать лишних вопросов. Так просто, но она не справилась даже с этим".

traits.locale_text: "Привести тебя сюда и не задавать лишних вопросов. Так просто, но она не справилась даже с этим".

languages.text: "Bring you here, to the Altar of Change, and not ask questions. So simple, but she couldn't even manage that."
languages.original_text: "Привести тебя сюда, к Алтарю Перемен, и не задавать лишних вопросов. Так просто, но она не справилась даже с этим".

traits.locale_text: "Bring you here, to the Altar of Change, and not ask questions. So simple, but she couldn't even manage that."
"Bring you here, to the Altar of Change, and not ask questions. So simple, but she couldn't even manage that."
"Bring you here, to the Altar of Change, and not ask questions. So simple, but she couldn't even manage that."
"Bring you here, to the Altar of Change, and not ask questions. So simple, but she couldn't even manage that."
"Bring you here, to the Altar of Change, and not ask questions. So simple, but she couldn't even manage that."

languages.text: “把你带到诡变祭坛这里来，别问问题，就这么简单。可她却连这个都做不好。”
languages.original_text: "Bring you here, to the Altar of Change, and not ask questions. So simple, but she couldn't even manage that."

traits.locale_text: “把你带到诡变祭坛这里来，别问问题，就这么简单。可她却连这个都做不好。”

languages.text: «Traerle aquí, al Altar del Cambio, sin hacer preguntas. Una tarea sencilla, pero ni eso ha sido capaz de hacer».
languages.original_text: "Bring you here, to the Altar of Change, and not ask questions. So simple, but she couldn't even manage that."

traits.locale_text: «Traerle aquí, al Altar del Cambio, sin hacer preguntas. Una tarea sencilla, pero ni eso ha sido capaz de hacer».

languages.text: "Seni buraya, Dönüşüm Sunağı'na getirmek ve soru sormamak. Çok basit ama bunu bile başaramadı."
languages.original_text: "Bring you here, to the Altar of Change, and not ask questions. So simple, but she couldn't even manage that."

traits.locale_text: "Seni buraya, Dönüşüm Sunağı'na getirmek ve soru sormamak. Çok basit ama bunu bile başaramadı."

languages.text: 「お前を変化の祭壇に連れてきて、質問しないことだ。とても簡単なことだが、こいつはそれさえできなかった」
languages.original_text: "Bring you here, to the Altar of Change, and not ask questions. So simple, but she couldn't even manage that."

traits.locale_text: 「お前をここに連れてきて、質問しないことだ。とても簡単なことだが、こいつはそれさえできなかった」

languages.text: « Vous amener à l'Autel du Changement sans poser de question. Ça n'avait rien de bien compliqué, et pourtant, même ça, elle n'y est pas parvenue. »
languages.original_text: "Bring you here, to the Altar of Change, and not ask questions. So simple, but she couldn't even manage that."

traits.locale_text: « Vous amener à l'Autel du Changement sans poser de question. Ça n'avait rien de bien compliqué, et pourtant, même ça, elle n'y est pas parvenue. »

languages.text: "Euch herbringen zum Altar der Veränderung und keine Fragen stellen. So einfach, doch nicht einmal das hat sie geschafft."
languages.original_text: "Bring you here, to the Altar of Change, and not ask questions. So simple, but she couldn't even manage that."

traits.locale_text: "Euch herbringen zum Altar der Veränderung und keine Fragen stellen. So einfach, doch nicht einmal das hat sie geschafft."
